snippet: Supreme Court Justices Ruth Bader Ginsburg and Samuel A. Alito Jr. are among the luminaries scheduled to speak at the New-York Historical Society this fall and winter.
abstract: Supreme Court Justices Ruth Bader Ginsburg and Samuel A. Alito Jr. are among the luminaries scheduled to speak at the New-York Historical Society this fall and winter.

headline.main: Ginsburg and Alito to Speak at New-York Historical Society
headline.print_headline: Justices to Speak at Historical Society
